channel.title: How to hide files and make only 1 file running ?~~ I really need this ! REP ++
channel.description:
Hey all,
I wanna ask if someone of you know how to hide my server files so others cant see it.
and also how to make only 1 program run ??
cuz i have 2 running ATM( the server AND the client )
I'll rep the helper cuz i really need this ! :D thnx

item.title: How to hide files and make only 1 file running ?~~ I really need this ! REP ++
item.dc:creator: @Sideways_8 Sideways_8
item.description:
@Sideways_8 wrote:

No you can’t lol, a decompiled version of a .class file is entitrely different than a .java download the JDecompiler and see for yourself lol.

Read full topic
item.source: How to hide files and make only 1 file running ?~~ I really need this ! REP ++

item.title: How to hide files and make only 1 file running ?~~ I really need this ! REP ++
item.dc:creator: @zerogordo zerogordo
item.description:
@zerogordo wrote:

Sideways_8:

Actually no. Decompiling a .java file doesn’t render the same contents as the original .java itself. If you were to decompile and put the results into a .java, the client/server wouldn’t function properly.

Nah hes right but if you know anything about java or most programming systems you can just modify it so it will work.

Read full topic
item.source: How to hide files and make only 1 file running ?~~ I really need this ! REP ++

item.title: How to hide files and make only 1 file running ?~~ I really need this ! REP ++
item.dc:creator: @blindskills blindskills
item.description:
@blindskills wrote:

[quote=“Superd00d, post:5, topic:330925”]Why would you want that, as other players do not need to run the source. What your asking is completely unnecessary.
@side, deleting you .java files won’t work. People can still decompile.[/quote]

but a friend of my said that he couldn’t play without having the server opened ?
so…

Read full topic

@Superd00d wrote:

Acually, yes it would. And you decompile .class files not .java files. And if you got the decompiler correct then it DOES compile and function properly.

item.source: How to hide files and make only 1 file running ?~~ I really need this ! REP ++

item.title: How to hide files and make only 1 file running ?~~ I really need this ! REP ++
item.dc:creator: @blindskills blindskills
item.description:
@blindskills wrote:

Sideways_8:

Its impossible to have only one window running for your client and server, you could add some batch file code to call the Run server from the client Run.bat, but it would still use 2 windows. And to hide your files, it depends. If your going to post the client online for download, etc. Then delete the *.java files. Then select the remaining .class files and folders, (highlight them all) then right click, his properties, and check the “Hidden” box, then apply, and voila. (:

Thanks for the hiding tip

but do you know how to make only 1 file that will make the client AND the server pop up ? :o

Read full topic
item.source: How to hide files and make only 1 file running ?~~ I really need this ! REP ++

item.title: How to hide files and make only 1 file running ?~~ I really need this ! REP ++
item.dc:creator: @Sideways_8 Sideways_8
item.description:
@Sideways_8 wrote:

Its impossible to have only one window running for your client and server, you could add some batch file code to call the Run server from the client Run.bat, but it would still use 2 windows. And to hide your files, it depends. If your going to post the client online for download, etc. Then delete the *.java files. Then select the remaining .class files and folders, (highlight them all) then right click, his properties, and check the “Hidden” box, then apply, and voila. (:

Read full topic
